full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 747 Filed 08/10/22 Page 173 of 228 849 LC2Qmax5 - corrected Alessi - Direct 1 Q. About when do you remember first seeing this directory? 2 A. Probably 1995, '96. 3 Q. Were there different versions of this directory? 4 A. Those directories were updated. 5 Q. How often were they updated? 6 A. I think it was once a year or maybe twice a year. 7 Q. When they were updated, what did you do with the old ones? 8 A. We just threw it away. 9 Q. Did you look at different versions of the directory over the years you worked for Mr. Epstein? 10 11 A. Yes. 12 Q. And when you got an updated version, were there new contacts added? 13 14 A. Yes. 15 Q. Did you ever notice contacts being removed? 16 A. I don't recall being removed. 17 Q. Who did you see using these directories? 18 A. Ms. Maxwell, Mr. Epstein. 19 Q. Where were you supposed to keep copies of this directory? 20 A. We were supposed to keep the copies, one in the kitchen desk, it was a little tiny desk at the kitchen next to the 21 telephone, it was at Ms. Maxwell's desk, Mr. Epstein's three 22 desks he had in the house, Ms. Maxwell's each side of her night 23 table or Mr. Epstein's night table. 24 25 MS. COMEY: Your Honor, may I approach the witness SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00012458
